languages.text: {n}От пристального наблюдения за творящейся богохульной мерзостью в голове возникает неприятный зуд. Вы понимаете, что навечно запомните эти жуткие нечеловеческие слова, произносимые колдуном — они врезались в вашу память, вытеснив нечто... важное, что прежде было в ней. Вам все никак не удается вспомнить, что же именно.{/n}

{n}Watching this loathsome act of desecration take place before you fills your head with an unnerving sensation. You realise you will forever remember these disturbing, inhuman words the sorcerer is speaking — they have embedded themselves in your memory in place of something... important that was there before. Try as you might, you cannot remember what it was.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}От пристального наблюдения за творящейся богохульной мерзостью в голове возникает неприятный зуд. Вы понимаете, что навечно запомните эти жуткие нечеловеческие слова, произносимые колдуном — они врезались в вашу память, вытеснив нечто... важное, что прежде было в ней. Вам все никак не удается вспомнить, что же именно.{/n}

languages.text: {n}光是看着眼前这令人厌恶的亵渎行为，你的意识中便充满了不安的感觉。你意识到，眼前这个巫师说出的那些令人不安的异端话语，会永远留在你的脑中。这些话已经嵌入了你的记忆，取代了原有的某些……重要的东西。无论你怎么努力，都想不起来是什么东西被遗忘了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Watching this loathsome act of desecration take place before you fills your head with an unnerving sensation. You realise you will forever remember these disturbing, inhuman words the sorcerer is speaking — they have embedded themselves in your memory in place of something... important that was there before. Try as you might, you cannot remember what it was.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}光是看着眼前这令人厌恶的亵渎行为，你的意识中便充满了不安的感觉。你意识到，眼前这个巫师说出的那些令人不安的异端话语，会永远留在你的脑中。这些话已经嵌入了你的记忆，取代了原有的某些……重要的东西。无论你怎么努力，都想不起来是什么东西被遗忘了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le spectacle de cette immonde profanation qui se déroule juste sous vos yeux vous emplit la tête d'une sensation déroutante. Vous réalisez que vous vous souviendrez à tout jamais des paroles non-humaines et perturbantes prononcées par le sorcier ; elles se sont incrustées dans votre mémoire en y remplaçant quelque chose... d'important. Malgré tous vos efforts, il vous est impossible de retrouver ce que vous venez d'oublier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Watching this loathsome act of desecration take place before you fills your head with an unnerving sensation. You realise you will forever remember these disturbing, inhuman words the sorcerer is speaking — they have embedded themselves in your memory in place of something... important that was there before. Try as you might, you cannot remember what it was.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le spectacle de cette immonde profanation qui se déroule juste sous vos yeux vous emplit la tête d'une sensation déroutante. Vous réalisez que vous vous souviendrez à tout jamais des paroles inhumaines et perturbantes prononcées par le sorcier ; elles se sont incrustées dans votre mémoire en y remplaçant quelque chose... d'important. Malgré tous vos efforts, il vous est impossible de retrouver ce que vous venez d'oublier.{/n}

languages.text: {n}この憎むべき冒涜行為が目の前で行われるのを見て、頭の中が無気味な感覚に満たされる。ソーサラーが話しているこの不穏で人間離れした言葉は、記憶の中に永遠に刻まれるだろう――何か重要な記憶の代わりにスッと置き換わってしまったかのようだ…その大事な記憶が何であったか、もはや思い出せない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Watching this loathsome act of desecration take place before you fills your head with an unnerving sensation. You realise you will forever remember these disturbing, inhuman words the sorcerer is speaking — they have embedded themselves in your memory in place of something... important that was there before. Try as you might, you cannot remember what it was.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この憎むべき冒涜行為が目の前で行われるのを見て、頭の中が無気味な感覚に満たされる。ソーサラーが話しているこの不穏で人間離れした言葉は、記憶の中に永遠に刻まれるだろう――何か重要な記憶の代わりにスッと置き換わってしまったかのようだ…その大事な記憶が何であったか、もはや思い出せない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ver esta inmunda profanación llena tu mente de una sensación perturbadora. Te das cuenta de que nunca podrás olvidar las inhumanas palabras del hechicero, que ocupan tu mente sustituyendo algo... importante que estaba antes. Por mucho que te esfuerzas, no logras recordar de qué se trata.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Watching this loathsome act of desecration take place before you fills your head with an unnerving sensation. You realise you will forever remember these disturbing, inhuman words the sorcerer is speaking — they have embedded themselves in your memory in place of something... important that was there before. Try as you might, you cannot remember what it was.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ver esta inmunda profanación llena tu mente de una sensación perturbadora. Por mucho que te esfuerzas, no logras recordar de qué se trata.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Diesen schändlichen Akt der Entweihung mitanzusehen, erfüllt dich mit einem erschütternden Gefühl. Dir wird klar, dass du die verstörenden, unmenschlichen Worte, die der Hexer spricht, nie wieder vergessen wirst. Sie haben sich in dein Gedächtnis eingegraben und etwas anderes verdrängt, etwas ... Wichtiges. So sehr du dich auch bemühst, du kannst dich nicht erinnern, was es war.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Watching this loathsome act of desecration take place before you fills your head with an unnerving sensation. You realise you will forever remember these disturbing, inhuman words the sorcerer is speaking — they have embedded themselves in your memory in place of something... important that was there before. Try as you might, you cannot remember what it was.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Diesen schändlichen Akt der Entweihung mitanzusehen, erfüllt dich mit einem erschütternden Gefühl. Dir wird klar, dass du die verstörenden, unmenschlichen Worte, die der Hexer spricht, nie wieder vergessen wirst. Sie haben sich in dein Gedächtnis eingegraben und etwas anderes verdrängt, etwas ... Wichtiges. So sehr du dich auch bemühst, du kannst dich nicht erinnern, was es war.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu denli iğrenç bir saygısızlığa tanık olmak, zihnini rahatsız edici hislerin ele geçirmesine neden oluyor. Sahirin zikrettiği bu kaygı verici, insan dışı sözcükleri sonsuza dek hatırlayacağını fark ediyorsun. Sözcükler birer birer aklına kazınıp bir şeyin yerini alıyor... Daha önce zihninde olan, önemli bir şeyin. Ne kadar denersen dene kaybettiğin şeyi hatırlayamıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Watching this loathsome act of desecration take place before you fills your head with an unnerving sensation. You realise you will forever remember these disturbing, inhuman words the sorcerer is speaking — they have embedded themselves in your memory in place of something... important that was there before. Try as you might, you cannot remember what it was.{/n}
